name: mobile-wallet-document-builder
description: A service for filling in the content of documents, storing them and, through integration with a wallet credential issuer, providing the links needed to load those documents into the GOV.UK Wallet

scripts.build: npx tsc && npm run build-sass && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/style.css && sass --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/stylesheets/application.css --style compressed
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js dist/public/scripts && rm -rf dist/assets && cp -rf node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/assets dist/assets
scripts.dev: nodemon -e js,ts --watch src --exec "npm run build:ts && npm run start"
